# 

1.String Number Boolean Undefined Null Symbol BigInt

2.Object Array Date Function



# 

1.typeofarraynullobject

2. instanceof Array|Object

```
var arr = [1,2,3,1];
alert(arr instanceof Array); // true
```

3.constructor 

```
var arr = [1,2,3,1];
alert(arr.constructor === Array); // true 
```

bugiframeframe

4. Array.isArray() true

5.Obejct.protoType.toString.call()

```
var arr = [1,2,3,1];
var arr2 = [{ abac : 1, abc : 2 }];
function isArrayFn(value){
if (typeof Array.isArray === "function") {
return Array.isArray(value);
}else{
return Object.prototype.toString.call(value) === "[object Array]";
}
}
alert(isArrayFn(arr));// true
alert(isArrayFn(arr2));// true
```



# ?

**:**,,         ,,,,,

**:**,,,, 

```
function deepClone(obj) {
	if (obj === null) return null; //null 
	if (obj instanceof RegExp) return new RegExp(obj); //
    if (obj instanceof Date) return new Date(obj); //
    if (typeof obj != "object") {
    	//, 
   		return obj
    }
    //[].__proto__.constructor=Array()
    //{}.__proto__.constructor=Object()
    //,new
    var newObj = new Object.getPrototypeOf(obj).constructor;
	for (var key in obj) {
		newObj[key] = deepClone(obj[key])
	}
	return newObj;
}
```



# typeof  instanceof?   

**typeof**Number|String|Boolean|Undefined|Symbol|BigInt(null),function,Date,Array ;**instanceof**,,.

**instanceof**

[] instanceof []

 prototype instanceof  prototype false



# JavaScript 

 `prototype` `__proto__`

```
// 
console.log({}.__proto__); // => {}

function Student(name, grade) {
  this.name = name;
  this.grade = grade;
}

const stu = new Student('xiaoMing', 6);
// Student 
console.log(stu.__proto__); // => Student {}
```

`__proto__`  ES6 `Reflect.getPrototypeOf`  `Object.getPrototypeOf()`  `Symbol.proto`  key 

```js
console.log({}.__proto__ === Object.getPrototypeOf({})); // => true
```

###  prototype

 `constructor` JavaScript ****Student  Student  new 

```js
function Apple() {}
const apple = new Apple();
console.log(apple instanceof Apple); // => true
//  apple1.__proto__
console.log(apple1.__proto__ === Apple.prototype); // => true
console.log(apple2.__proto__ === Apple.prototype); // => true
```

** prototype **

 `prototype`  `constructor` 

```js
console.log(Apple.prototype.constructor === Apple); // => true
```

`__proto__` `prototype``constructor``Apple` `apple` `[[prototype]]` 

![](0.png)


`__proto__` `prototype` `prototype`  new  `__proto__` `__proto__` `prototype`

### 

 obj  obj`obj.__proto__`  obj  `obj.__proto__.__proto__`****`Object.prototype` `Object.prototype.__proto__` null undefined

```js
function Student(name, grade) {
  this.name = name;
  this.grade = grade;
}

const stu = new Student();
console.log(stu.notExists); // => undefined
```

 `stu.notExists` 

1.  `stu`  `notExists` `stu.__proto__`
2. `stu.__proto__`  `notExists`  `stu.__proto__.__proto__`****`Object.prototype`
3. **** `notExists` `stu.__proto__.__proto__.__proto__`  null
4. null  `notExists`  undefined

****proto__.__proto__ === {}.__proto__); // => true
```

**** null

```
console.log(new Object().__proto__.__proto__); // => null
```



![](1.png)

 `Student` 

![student](2.png)

```
var arr = [1,2,3,1];
var arr2 = [{ abac : 1, abc : 2 }];
function isArrayFn(value){
if (typeof Array.isArray === "function") {
return Array.isArray(value);
}else{
return Object.prototype.toString.call(value) === "[object Array]";
}
}
alert(isArrayFn(arr));// true
alert(isArrayFn(arr2));// true
```

**:**,,         ,,,,,

```
function deepClone(obj) {
	if (obj === null) return null; //null 
	if (obj instanceof RegExp) return new RegExp(obj); //
    if (obj instanceof Date) return new Date(obj); //
    if (typeof obj != "object") {
    	//, 
   		return obj
    }
    //[].__proto__.constructor=Array()
    //{}.__proto__.constructor=Object()
    //,new
    var newObj = new Object.getPrototypeOf(obj).constructor;
	for (var key in obj) {
		newObj[key] = deepClone(obj[key])
	}
	return newObj;
}
```

> JavaScript ![1](1.jpg) ![2](2.jpg) > JS ``` DOM
JS document.getElementById('a').addEventListener('click', e => {console.log(1)}); document.getElementById('b').addEventListener('click', e => {e.preventDefault();console.log(2)}); idbdiv 2 1 ``` e.preventDefault() e.stopPropagation() > ``` var a = 10.42; a parseInt(a); Math.floor(a); Math.ceil(a);X a.split('.')[0];X ``` A. ==parseInt==1010 B. ==floor==10 C. ==ceil==11 D. ==split==TypeError > JSchildren childNodes 1. children **children**children**HTML** 2. childNodes **childNodes**childrenchildNodes**HTML****** HTML/firstChild HTMLfirstChildnodeType ``` function getFirst(elem){ for(var i=0,e;e=elem.childNodes[i++];){ if(e.nodeType==1) return e; } } ```

c++ LeetCode 912.

$O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ $\checkmark$ $\checkmark$
$O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ $\times$ $\checkmark$
$O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ $\checkmark$ $\checkmark$
$O(n\log n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(\log n)$~$O(n)$ $\times$ $\checkmark$
$O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(n)$ $\checkmark$ $\checkmark$
$O(n^{1.3})$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n\log n)$~$O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ $\times$ $\checkmark$
$O(n+k)$ $O(n+k)$ $O(n+k)$ $O(n+k)$ $\checkmark$ $\times$
$O(nk)$ $O(nk)$ $O(nk)$ $O(n+k)$ $\checkmark$ $\times$
$O(n)$ $O(n)$ $O(n)$ $O(n+m)$ $\checkmark$ $\times$
$O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(1)$ $\times$ $\checkmark$


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selection_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merge_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shellsort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Counting_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radix_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bucket_sort


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort

vector<int> xxxSort(vector<int>& nums) vector<int> 

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> sortArray(vector<int>& nums) {
        return quickSort(nums);
    }

    // 
    vector<int> bubbleSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            for (int j = n-2; j >= i; --j) {
                if (nums[j] > nums[j+1]) {
                    swap(nums[j], nums[j+1]);
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> selectSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            int idx = i;
            for (int j = i; j < n; ++j) {
                if (nums[j] < nums[idx]) {
                    idx = j;
                }
            }
            swap(nums[i], nums[idx]);
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> insertSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            for (int j = i; j > 0 && nums[j] < nums[j-1]; --j) {
                swap(nums[j], nums[j-1]);
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 24 ms
    void qSort(vector<int>& nums, int l, int r) {
        if (l >= r) return;
        int m = l;
        for (int i = l; i < r; ++i) {
            if (nums[i] < nums[r]) {
                swap(nums[m++], nums[i]);
            }
        }
        swap(nums[m], nums[r]);
        qSort(nums, l, m-1);
        qSort(nums, m+1, r);
    }

    vector<int> quickSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        qSort(nums, 0, n-1);
        return nums;
    }

    // 192 ms
    vector<int> mSort(vector<int>& nums, int l, int r) {
        if (l >= r) return {nums[l]};
        int m = l+(r-l)/2;
        vector<int> lnums = mSort(nums, l, m);
        vector<int> rnums = mSort(nums, m+1, r);
        vector<int> res;
        int i = 0, j = 0;
        while (i <= m-l && j <= r-m-1) {
            if (lnums[i] < rnums[j]) {
                res.push_back(lnums[i++]);
            } else {
                res.push_back(rnums[j++]);
            }
        }
        while (i <= m-l) {
            res.push_back(lnums[i++]);
        }
        while (j <= r-m-1) {
            res.push_back(rnums[j++]);
        }
        return res;
    }

    vector<int> mergeSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        nums = mSort(nums, 0, n-1);
        return nums;
    }

    //  + 80 ms
    vector<int> mergeSortNR(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int len = 1; len < n; len <<= 1) {
            for (int l = 0; l < n-len; l += 2*len) {
                int m = l+len-1;
                int r = min(n-1, l+2*len-1);
                vector<int> res;
                int i = l, j = m+1;
                while (i <= m && j <= r) {
                    if (nums[i] < nums[j]) {
                        res.push_back(nums[i++]);
                    } else {
                        res.push_back(nums[j++]);
                    }
                }
                while (i <= m) {
                    res.push_back(nums[i++]);
                }
                while (j <= r) {
                    res.push_back(nums[j++]);
                }
                for (int i = l; i <= r; ++i) {
                    nums[i] = res[i-l];
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 40 ms
    vector<int> shellSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int gap = n/2; gap > 0; gap /= 2) {
            for (int i = gap; i < n; ++i) {
                for (int j = i; j-gap >= 0 && nums[j-gap] > nums[j]; j -= gap) {
                    swap(nums[j-gap], nums[j]);
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 32 ms
    vector<int> countSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        if (!n) return {};
        int minv = *min_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int m = maxv-minv+1;
        vector<int> count(m, 0);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            count[nums[i]-minv]++;
        }
        vector<int> res;
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            for (int j = 0; j < count[i]; ++j) {
                res.push_back(i+minv);
            }
        }
        return res;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> radixSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int maxd = 0;
        while (maxv > 0) {
            maxv /= 10;
            maxd++;
        }
        vector<int> count(10, 0), rank(n, 0);
        int base = 1;
        while (maxd > 0) {
            count.assign(10, 0);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
                count[(nums[i]/base)%10]++;
            }
            for (int i = 1; i < 10; ++i) {
                count[i] += count[i-1];
            }
            for (int i = n-1; i >= 0; --i) {
                rank[--count[(nums[i]/base)%10]] = nums[i];
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
                nums[i] = rank[i];
            }
            maxd--;
            base *= 10;
        }
        return nums;
    }

    //  (20 ms)
    vector<int> bucketSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int minv = *min_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int bs = 1000;
        int m = (maxv-minv)/bs+1;
        vector<vector<int> > bucket(m);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            bucket[(nums[i]-minv)/bs].push_back(nums[i]);
        }
        int idx = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            int sz = bucket[i].size();
            bucket[i] = quickSort(bucket[i]);
            for (int j = 0; j < sz; ++j) {
                nums[idx++] = bucket[i][j];
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 32 ms
    void adjust(vector<int>& nums, int p, int s) {
        while (2*p+1 < s) {
            int c1 = 2*p+1;
            int c2 = 2*p+2;
            int c = (c2<s && nums[c2]>nums[c1]) ? c2 : c1;
            if (nums[c] > nums[p]) swap(nums[c], nums[p]);
            else break;
            p = c;
        }
    }

    vector<int> heapSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = n/2-1; i >= 0; --i) {
            adjust(nums, i, n);
        }
        for (int i = n-1; i > 0; --i) {
            swap(nums[0], nums[i]);
            adjust(nums, 0, i);
        }
        return nums;
    }
};

c++ LeetCode 912.

$O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ $\checkmark$ $\checkmark$

vector<int> xxxSort(vector<int>& nums) vector<int> 

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> sortArray(vector<int>& nums) {
        return quickSort(nums);
    }

    // 
    vector<int> bubbleSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            for (int j = n-2; j >= i; --j) {
                if (nums[j] > nums[j+1]) {
                    swap(nums[j], nums[j+1]);
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> selectSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            int idx = i;
            for (int j = i; j < n; ++j) {
                if (nums[j] < nums[idx]) {
                    idx = j;
                }
            }
            swap(nums[i], nums[idx]);
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> insertSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            for (int j = i; j > 0 && nums[j] < nums[j-1]; --j) {
                swap(nums[j], nums[j-1]);
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 24 ms
    void qSort(vector<int>& nums, int l, int r) {
        if (l >= r) return;
        int m = l;
        for (int i = l; i < r; ++i) {
            if (nums[i] < nums[r]) {
                swap(nums[m++], nums[i]);
            }
        }
        swap(nums[m], nums[r]);
        qSort(nums, l, m-1);
        qSort(nums, m+1, r);
    }

    vector<int> quickSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        qSort(nums, 0, n-1);
        return nums;
    }

    // 192 ms
    vector<int> mSort(vector<int>& nums, int l, int r) {
        if (l >= r) return {nums[l]};
        int m = l+(r-l)/2;
        vector<int> lnums = mSort(nums, l, m);
        vector<int> rnums = mSort(nums, m+1, r);
        vector<int> res;
        int i = 0, j = 0;
        while (i <= m-l && j <= r-m-1) {
            if (lnums[i] < rnums[j]) {
                res.push_back(lnums[i++]);
            } else {
                res.push_back(rnums[j++]);
            }
        }
        while (i <= m-l) {
            res.push_back(lnums[i++]);
        }
        while (j <= r-m-1) {
            res.push_back(rnums[j++]);
        }
        return res;
    }

    vector<int> mergeSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        nums = mSort(nums, 0, n-1);
        return nums;
    }

    //  + 80 ms
    vector<int> mergeSortNR(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int len = 1; len < n; len <<= 1) {
            for (int l = 0; l < n-len; l += 2*len) {
                int m = l+len-1;
                int r = min(n-1, l+2*len-1);
                vector<int> res;
                int i = l, j = m+1;
                while (i <= m && j <= r) {
                    if (nums[i] < nums[j]) {
                        res.push_back(nums[i++]);
                    } else {
                        res.push_back(nums[j++]);
                    }
                }
                while (i <= m) {
                    res.push_back(nums[i++]);
                }
                while (j <= r) {
                    res.push_back(nums[j++]);
                }
                for (int i = l; i <= r; ++i) {
                    nums[i] = res[i-l];
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 40 ms
    vector<int> shellSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int gap = n/2; gap > 0; gap /= 2) {
            for (int i = gap; i < n; ++i) {
                for (int j = i; j-gap >= 0 && nums[j-gap] > nums[j]; j -= gap) {
                    swap(nums[j-gap], nums[j]);
                }
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 32 ms
    vector<int> countSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        if (!n) return {};
        int minv = *min_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int m = maxv-minv+1;
        vector<int> count(m, 0);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            count[nums[i]-minv]++;
        }
        vector<int> res;
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            for (int j = 0; j < count[i]; ++j) {
                res.push_back(i+minv);
            }
        }
        return res;
    }

    // 
    vector<int> radixSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int maxd = 0;
        while (maxv > 0) {
            maxv /= 10;
            maxd++;
        }
        vector<int> count(10, 0), rank(n, 0);
        int base = 1;
        while (maxd > 0) {
            count.assign(10, 0);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
                count[(nums[i]/base)%10]++;
            }
            for (int i = 1; i < 10; ++i) {
                count[i] += count[i-1];
            }
            for (int i = n-1; i >= 0; --i) {
                rank[--count[(nums[i]/base)%10]] = nums[i];
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
                nums[i] = rank[i];
            }
            maxd--;
            base *= 10;
        }
        return nums;
    }

    //  (20 ms)
    vector<int> bucketSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        int maxv = *max_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int minv = *min_element(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        int bs = 1000;
        int m = (maxv-minv)/bs+1;
        vector<vector<int> > bucket(m);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            bucket[(nums[i]-minv)/bs].push_back(nums[i]);
        }
        int idx = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            int sz = bucket[i].size();
            bucket[i] = quickSort(bucket[i]);
            for (int j = 0; j < sz; ++j) {
                nums[idx++] = bucket[i][j];
            }
        }
        return nums;
    }

    // 32 ms
    void adjust(vector<int>& nums, int p, int s) {
        while (2*p+1 < s) {
            int c1 = 2*p+1;
            int c2 = 2*p+2;
            int c = (c2<s && nums[c2]>nums[c1]) ? c2 : c1;
            if (nums[c] > nums[p]) swap(nums[c], nums[p]);
            else break;
            p = c;
        }
    }

    vector<int> heapSort(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = n/2-1; i >= 0; --i) {
            adjust(nums, i, n);
        }
        for (int i = n-1; i > 0; --i) {
            swap(nums[0], nums[i]);
            adjust(nums, 0, i);
        }
        return nums;
    }
};
